rs-layer.title: Making meaningful connections image - students gather around laptop computer
Collaborating for the Common Good - FALA students at Flagstaff Youth Climate Summit
Preparing tomorrow's leaders - FALA students discuss a scientific presentation
Pursuing excellence in the arts - student artwork, an impressionistic painting of a deer
Mountain majestic beauty - the FALA campus at sunset with the San Francisco peaks in the background

img.alt: FALA campus sunset with peaks in background

img.alt: Art Exchange for Change @ FALA Campus

div.div: The Human Learning Community’s All-School Project created Art Exchange for Change. Students created one-of-a-kind artworks/positive message postcards in exchange for a donation of rice, pasta, cereal, soup, canned goods of proteins- veggies- beans-fruit, $$ for the Flagstaff Family Food Center.…
